CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Backlog__c = 0, InLifting__c = 0, InApproval__c = 0, Finished__c = 0), "Não iniciado", IF( AND(Backlog__c > 0, InLifting__c = 0, InApproval__c = 0, Finished__c = 0), "Discutida", IF( AND(Finished__c > 0, Backlog__c = 0, InLifting__c = 0, InApproval__c = 0), "Concluído", "Em levantamento" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Status Levantamento
